data.title: Alas, Babylon
data.meta_description: Edition: First Edition Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good Jacket Condition: Very Good Binding: Hardcover ISBN: B07ZXNL8H8
data.text:
Edition: First Edition

Book Condition: Collectible - Very Good

Jacket Condition: Very Good

Binding: Hardcover

ISBN: B07ZXNL8H8

First Edition, 2nd Printing. Not price-clipped ($3.50 price intact). Published by Lippincott, 1959. Octavo. Black cloth boards stamped in white. Book is very good. Sharp corners, binding tight and pages crisp. Slight spine lean and spotting to page ends and endpapers. Previous owner initials on rear flyleaf. Dust jacket is very good with shelf wear, edge wear, and small tears. Toning and spotting on spine. A very good copy of this novel by Pat Frank. 253 pages.

100% positive feedback. 30 day money back guarantee. NEXT DAY SHIPPING! Excellent customer service. Please email with any questions or if you would like a photo. All books packed carefully and ship with free delivery confirmation/tracking. All books come with free bookmarks. Ships from Southampton, New York.

Item #154471
